template.name: Restaurant Reservations For The Travel Trade

div.h2: Amendments are possible only before 36 hours of the booking date/time

t.span: Note: The menus/drinks with the INCLUDED tag are that of your original booking. You use the + and - icons to change the quantity. If you wish to change the date of booking, please use the CHANGE BOOKING DATE option above.

div.h4: Sorry, No time found for selected Date and Type. Please change the type.

a.t-att-style: 'pointer-events: none;' if lead_browse and lead_browse.stage_id.name == 'Paid' else ''

i.t-att-class: 'hidden' if lead_browse and lead_browse.stage_id.name == 'Paid' else 'fa fa-plus-circle'

div.a: Click here to see the menu

i.t-att-class: 'hidden' if lead_browse and lead_browse.stage_id.name == 'Paid' else 'fa fa-plus-circle'

div.a: Click here to see the details

div.h5: Seats are not available for the selected time.

ul.h6: Please select the menus to proceed.

i.t-att-class: 'hidden' if lead_browse and lead_browse.stage_id.name == 'Paid' else 'fa fa-minus-circle'
'hidden' if lead_browse and lead_browse.stage_id.name == 'Paid' else 'fa fa-trash'

t.span: Note: Your changes will be saved on clicking the button below. You will be taken to the next page to review Booking Details and complete the amendment process.

nav.class: navbar navbar-default navbar-fixed-bottom visible-xs visible-sm mobile-cart-nav

p.span: Please select number of guests to proceed

t.t-value: user.partner_id.wbsite_color or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.wbsite_color or ''

tr.t-att-style: drink.to_mu > 0 and user.role != 'client_cust' and user.is_wlabeling and 'border-bottom:1px solid #CCC;border-left:5px solid '+str(wcolor)+';' or drink.to_mu > 0 and user.role != 'client_cust' and 'border-bottom:1px solid #CCC;border-left:5px solid #793487;' or 'border-bottom:1px solid #CCC;'

td.a: Click here to see the details

at . Please remove the record from the cart to proceed.

t.t-esc: 'Partner Number' if url == 'www.choicedining.co.uk' else 'Tour Operator Reference'

div.label: Select Payment Type :
div.span: Note: Transaction charge of % per transaction on Debit Cards and % on Credit Cards will be applicable.
